pullRequest.title: Changed some things to public (from protected)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
I changed the access modifiers in ProgrammableAndroid.getScript() and ProgrammableAndroid.setScript() from protected to public so external addons can change android scrips (I need it for precisely that reason). I also changed Instruction enum to public
Changes

ProgrammableAndroid.getScript() and ProgrammableAndroid.setScript() are now public
Instruction is now public
Related Issues


None
Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I have added Nonnull and Nullable annotations to my methods to indicate their behaviour for null values
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

commit.message: Changed get and set scripts to public (from protected)

nodes.bodyText: Don't open things up that don't have sufficient parameter validation, the @Nonnull is not enforced here because it was an internal method, so you'd need to add a Validate call here.
